definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Only plain Latin letters and Arabic numbers allowed. No other characters will be accepted, including umlauts.
sentences.chinese: 只有普通的拉丁字母和阿拉伯數字允許的。

sentences.english: Users wrote homonyms for Mr Liu’s name, or abbreviations in Latin characters.
sentences.chinese: 用戶們寫的是劉先生的同音字，或者拉丁字母縮寫。

sentences.english: The lighter green indicates the countries that use the Latin alphabet as co-official script with other(s).
sentences.chinese: 淺綠色標明瞭以拉丁字母爲半官方書寫文字的國家。

sentences.english: Only for text containing letters from the Latin alphabet is a correct result returned.
sentences.chinese: 只有包含拉丁字母的文本纔會有正確的返回結果。

definition: Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
Gwoyeu Romatzyh, a romanization system for Chinese devised by Y.R. Chao and others in 1925-26
